name: Double Action 53: Volume 2
description:
The fun has been doubled with 16 brand new action packed games for the NES. Have a friend grab the second controller to tackle many of the multiplayer games featured here in Double Action 53: Volume 2!

Will you fight back-to-back against waves of baddies in Double Action Blaster Guys? Compete in the ultimate home decoration challenge in RHDE: Furniture Fight? Conclude an interstellar conflict in Solar Wars? Or enter the four-player free-for-all in Super PakPak?

It's not all multiplayer mayhem, though. Face a demon, suffer the horrors of war, challenge a god, or test your NES knowledge in our single-player epics. You can even just kick back and play a few casual rounds in modern-day classics like 2048 and robotfindskitten.

So, what are you waiting for?
Make your selection now!

Contents
  • Double Action Blaster Guys and Sliding Blaster by Joshua Hoffman
  • RHDE: Furniture Fight and Sound Effect Editor by Damian Yerrick
  • robotfindskitten by Damian Yerrick & Joshua Hoffman
    after Leonard Richardson
  • Solar Wars by Chris Covell, Joe Parsell, and Michel Iwaniec
  • Super PakPak by artoh / AOH Games
  • 1007 Bolts by user
  • 2048 by tsone after Gabriele Cirulli
  • Auge by Krill
  • Chase by Shiru
  • Function and MilioNESy by Denine
  • Love Story and Theremin by Tom Livak
  • PCB Artist by Paul Molloy
  • Sir Ababol  and Sgt. Helmet - Training Day
    by The Mojon Twins (Links NSFW)
  • Conway's Life by Joshua Hoffman after John Horton Conway

Some entries may have newer versions elsewhere, sometimes even in future volumes of Action 53. This collection retains the same versions available at the time this volume was released.

Action 53 Menu Program by Damian Yerrick.
Cover art, box, and label design by Johnathan Roatch.
